note.p: Career: Assistant Professor of Astronomy; made observations on magnetic intensity and inclination throughout Sweden (1850-1870); Professor of Physics, Uppsala; did important work in spectrum analysis; died of pachymeningitis
Authority: Altname from index to BR
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1876-1877 vol 25 pp xviii-xxii
References: Frank A J L James, 'The Conservation of Energy, Theories of Absorption and Resonating Molecules, 1851-1854: G G Stokes, A J Angstrom and W Thomson' in NR 1983-84 vol 38 pp 79-107
